lead_paragraph: DAILEY--Marie Carr, 83, of Albion, NY and Bailey Avenue, Bronx. Died July 8, survived by husband, three children, seven grandchildren. Excellence medal, Visitation School, tops at School of the Holy Child and Mt. St. Vincent. Cover Mademoiselle magazine August, 1952. Taught English New York City high schools and New York State Division of Youth. Mass 10am, July 16, Albion. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  DAILEY, MARIE CARR
